description: Master toggle for full Attribute-Based Access Control. When false only C-Suite protection applies. Set to true to enable all access rules.
C-Suite content protection is always enforced regardless of ABAC_ENABLED setting. Protects CEO Brief and C-Suite role briefs.
Capture user profile from Microsoft Directory on session start. Required for usage reporting by level department division region.
Enable access request workflow. Users can say request access to submit request to Platform team.
User profile cache duration in hours. Profile refreshed from directory after TTL expires.
Sync user attributes from Microsoft Entra ID / Azure AD. Required for ABAC enforcement.
Default access decision when no rule matches. ALLOW grants access. DENY requires explicit rule.
Log all access check decisions to eap_telemetry for audit and reporting.
